title: Unit Conversions
shortDescription: Unit conversion allows moving between different units of length, weight, and time.
importance: Unit conversion is needed in cooking, construction, sports, and travel. It also teaches about the decimal system.
howToTeach: Start with basic units and the relationships between them
For time - remember that 60 (not 10) is the important number
commonMistakes: Forgetting that time works in 60s, not 10s
Multiplying instead of dividing or vice versa
parentTips: Show a ruler and meter stick for practical examples
Create a conversion chart on the wall
